product_name: Capita Space Metal Fantasy Snowboard - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: While the unicorn has proven elusive, a solid park snowboard made for women doesn't have to be. The Capita Space Metal Fantasy snowboard is a rider-friendly, progression-oriented women's park board. Reverse rocker profile features flat kick tip and tail pre-positioned for laying down jibs and sliding boxes in the park. Wood composite core is designed to give jibbers and park riders the soft flex pattern they want without sacrificing durability; multi-direction glassing increases pop energy. Anchormat structural material is bonded to the tip and tail zones to increase strength and help avoid impact damage. ABS sidewalls; steel edges; extruded base; silkscreen topsheet. .
short_description: While the unicorn has proven elusive, a solid park snowboard made for women doesn't have to be. The Capita Space Metal Fantasy snowboard is a rider-friendly, progression-oriented women's park board.
